thread.title: RM100 surcharge for ETS offenders
thread.title_full: RM100 surcharge for ETS offenders - Nation | The Star Online

author: thestar.com.my
title: RM100 surcharge for ETS offenders
text:
KUALA LUMPUR: KTM Bhd will impose a surcharge of RM100 for passengers who ride on the Intercity train or ETS without a valid ticket.
KTM said the surcharge on such offenders, effective March 1, is an effort to educate the public – to ensure they had a valid ticket before coming on board the train.
“Valid tickets are important to determine the comfort and safety of passengers because passengers with a valid ticket have insurance coverage,” KTM said. — Bernama
